primaryTopic.creator: http://editor.vocabs.ands.org.au/user/Natalia-Atkins
primaryTopic.dcSource: Australian Ocean Data Network Organisation Register
primaryTopic.definition: Marine Science at the University of Sydney dates back to the 1880's. The Marine Studies Centre and the Ocean Science Institute were established in 1970, and these were replaced by the University of Sydney Institute of Marine Science (USIMS) in 2002.
primaryTopic.isReplacedBy: University of Sydney Institute of Marine Science (USIMS)

prefLabel._value: Ocean Science Institute, The University of Sydney (USYD)

primaryTopic.scopeNote: Organisation no longer exists. Replaced by http://vocab.aodn.org.au/def/organisation/entity/227
